Literature.Title: De novo generation of antimicrobial LK peptides with a single tryptophan at the critical amphipathic interface.
Literature.Author: Kang SJ, Won HS, Choi WS, Lee BJ

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633(MIC=>200µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538P(MIC=>200µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=>200µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>200µg/ml),Shigella dysenteriae ATCC 9752(MIC=>200µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MIC=>200µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 10031(MIC=>200µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=>200µg/ml)
